content.html: Shoutout to the dude who completely wiped out at the playground today while playing tag with his kid and then blamed it on his boots. It’s ok, man. Going way too hard playing tag with a 5 year old is actually extremely endearing.
content.value:
Shoutout to the dude who completely wiped out at the playground today while playing tag with his kid and then blamed it on his boots.

It’s ok, man. Going way too hard playing tag with a 5 year old is actually extremely endearing.
